QUERY_CLOB:
select
'N' pass_yn,
us.object_name, 
us.object_type,
us.line, 
apex_string.format('Consolidate instances of `%0`', substr(trim(us.text),1,30)) code,
to_char(rank() over (partition by us.object_type, us.object_name, sc.sql_id order by us.line)|| sc.sql_id) as unqid
from v_user_statements us
inner join (select sql_id
            from v_user_statements
            where sql_id is not null 
            and object_name not like '%_UT' --this requirement does not apply to utplsql packages
            having count(*) > 1
            group by sql_id ) sc on sc.sql_id = us.sql_id
where us.object_name not like '%_UT' --this requirement does not apply to utplsql packages
and us.object_name not like 'XXX%'
EXPLANATION: This statement appears more than once. Duplicate statements may cause inefficiency
FIX: Consider consolidating the statements into a single function or procedure
